name: Extreme Llama Fightback
description:
Available in english y español  

Become the llama god Urquchillay and defend the altiplano from mean-spirited conquistadores.
Explore the mountains, collect chakanas, solve puzzles, fight colonizers, make friends, get high and unlock new paths and abilities to experience one of three endings in this award-winning adventure game.

                  Kick some motherfucking ass!

         

This game is not historically acurrate. It is also dangerous to people with epilepsy or similar sensitivities.

SPEEDRUN FRIENDLY! The movement and combat systems that reward fast button presses are perfect for speedrunners looking to show of their skills! 
You may now speedrun this game!
